name: Unclear Unclear Unclear
description:
This game is a sequel to One of a Kind Creature, so the game will make a little more sense if you play it first.  It also contains references to Incompatible Fusion Machine.

Do not play this game if you are sensitive to flashing lights, or if you're under 18. And most certainly do not play if you're under 18 AND sensitive to flashing lights.

Sydney tries to make up for everything wrong he's done by helping out a friend of a friend.

Game is currently a little buggy, please let me know if you run into any.
